article_title: Paying for Body Parts: A Dilemma Obamacare Doesn't Have to Confront -- Yet

article_metadata.description: Should a person be allowed to sell his or her body parts? That was the question being debated several nights ago at the New York Academy of Medicine.  The discussion followed a preview screening of a new HBO documentary, “Tales from the Organ Trade.” The consensus answer was as surprising as [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Cohen
